NATIONAL INTEGRATED MATERNAL AND PERINATAL CARE GUIDELINES FOR SOUTH AFRICA 
174 
 
 
 
 
What preparation should there be for the meeting? 
 
• A schedule of PNRMs for the year needs to be published at the beginning of the year, and dates planned should 
be adhered to. 
• There should be a small committee at the facility
